game.name: SysAdmin Odyssey - Back to the office
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The SysAdmin simulator is a sandbox in which you can try on the role of a system administrator. Every new game day you will face different tasks and problems in the office where you work.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The SysAdmin simulator is a sandbox in which you can try on the role of a system administrator. Every new game day you will face different tasks and problems in the office where you work.
